fields.name: Needles-Allen
fields.description:
Coordinate system based on the Allen brain Atlas with an antero-posterior stretch and a dorso-ventral squeeze.

Origin Bregma, millimeters
x: medio-lateral, right positive
y: antero-posteror: front positive
z: dorso-ventral: up positive.

https://github.com/int-brain-lab/ibllib/blob/master/ibllib/atlas/atlas.py
https://github.com/int-brain-lab/ibllib-matlab

fields.name: IBL-Allen
fields.description:
Coordinate system based on the Allen brain Atlas for mice.

Origin Bregma, millimeters
x: medio-lateral, right positive
y: antero-posteror: front positive
z: dorso-ventral: up positive.

The API below works with several atlas resolutions:
https://github.com/int-brain-lab/ibllib/blob/master/ibllib/atlas/atlas.py
